snippet.title: Gameplay : Atari Jaguar - Fever Pitch Soccer
snippet.description: Awful. Sounds like Megadrive game, looks like megadrive game, plays like shit. All odds in this game are against player. It's simply impossible to accomplish anything here. Referee even gives freekicks to opponent when you possess the ball :) Can't see where your players are, theres nothing to indicate it. "Star player system" takes even the last joy out of this game. Well... I cant recommend this to even football fans (soccer in america).  Playing against friend is somewhat fun, but against AI its just torture.
